name: agape_api_restful
description: Agape Web is a RESTful API website I am developing to enhance my skills in technologies such as HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, Jsonwebtoken, bcryptjs, Cors, and Mysql2. author: Daniela Berrios
